A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There’s a lot of people with strong opinions about this movie whether it’s love or hate. I actually really loved this movie. I would place it as #4 on my list of Star Wars films. This film felt new and\, unlike a lot of my counterpart hardcore Star Wars fans\, I really enjoyed this new feel. The movie does have some lackluster moments (Rose/Finn\, Holdo) but the highs of this movie were some of the best in the series along with Vader/Luke in ESB and the Duel on Mustafar in Episode III. I’ve seen it twice and plan on going a third (possibly 4th) and\, if you didn’t like it the first time\, give it a second chance and go see it again. It got even better the second time.
